data.title: Series Editor: Crispin Bates
data.meta_description: Crispin Bates (Editor), Marina Carter (Editor) - Mutiny at the Margins_ New Perspectives on the Indian Uprising of 1857. Volume 7_ Documents of the Indian Uprising. 7-SAGE Publications India Pvt. Ltd - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides biographical information about Crispin Bates, the series editor of the "Mutiny at the Margins" book series. It notes that Bates is a professor of Modern and Contemporary South Asian History at the University of Edinburgh. It also provides brief biographies of Marina Carter and Crispin Bates, the editors of Volume 7 of the series, which focuses on primary source documents related to the 1857 Indian uprising.
